author: The Editorial Board
title: The New Sick Man of Europe
text:
The bad news for Italians ahead of their parliamentary election on Sunday is that someone will win. If ever there were a case of a political class failing to rise to a country’s challenges, this is it.
The last surveys in mid-February before an end-of-campaign polling moratorium showed three possible outcomes. A center-right coalition of Silvio Berlusconi’s Forza Italia and the Northern League could win enough seats to form a coalition with the ruling center-left Democratic Party. The center-right coalition could win enough...
